author: soispoke
content: applied for a talk on FOCIL specifically but a panel (and other talks on ILs) would be nice in any case!

author: potuz
content: which track did you apply? I was pondering on giving a talk on the general tradeoffs in any abstract system with examples from the known ones. But somehow a pannel of CR in general seems more useful, specially for a track like Cypherpunks... haven't really made up my mind about the topic yet

author: potuz
content: I did apply for an ePBS talk at core track, for ILs I was thinking on more generic terms, even without ePBS, the tradeoffs of not knowing statically the validity of the IL is not light, so I'm trying to think of systems that actually work for that
